name: Escape From Planet 0-X-100
description:
Can you make it to the end before the counter hits 100?

This is a submission for the Indie Spain Jam 2022 with the theme "Cero a Cien". Take control of a little rocket and maneouver through the levels while dodging obstacles.

Pixel artist ghosted the team a couple of days before the deadline without having given out what he did until that point and the programmer bailed with half the systems unimplemented the day before the deadline, so I did what I could to finish the game.

It still needs lots of polish, but I hope you can enjoy it!

Collaboration Credits

To the programmer (Lorgina) for helping with brainstorming, partial implementation of the checkpoint system and menus.

SFX Credits

SideArm Studios, Kenney Assets, AntumDeluge, dansevenstar.xyz

Music Credits

Art and Fonts Credits
